short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buyer extension for applying JuSaves discounts to online purchases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing JuSaves, your saving master! Start by installing our extension through our website, extension store or our IOS/Android app.  Sign up for an account through one of the four different ways: our website, our IOS App, Android App or through our JuSaves Extension.
Let me show you how easy it is to save. After signing up, install our free browser extension and start shopping as you would usually do at any of your favourite online stores, or you can find a store on our website or apps to shop at.  Our extension will notify you via popup if a good deal is available at the store you are shopping at. 
 Our extension will always help you automatically and effortlessly get better discount savings through discount codes and extra cashback from JuSaves commission sharing. We have a huge amount of affiliate stores and has all the discount codes/deals you need for all your favourite stores.
In addition, our extension has many other wonderful features. We will compare the compare product prices to make sure you get the best deal. If you leave a store without purchasing a product you wanted to because there isn’t a good deal, our extension will pop up a list of recommended stores with good deals.
When you have finished browsing the store and have added all the items you would like to purchase to cart, proceed to checkout.  If you have already found a promocode you would like to use, you can choose to apply it.  If our extension doesn’t have a better discount code than the one you applied, we will double your savings by rewarding you JuSaves credits of the same value as your discount. If we do have a better discount, you can choose whether you want to keep your own code or apply the better deal. Don’t worry if you don’t have your own code, there is also the option to let our extension apply the coupon codes we have found for you directly.  
Proceed to placing your order. If your order qualifies for extra cashback, you will automatically receive the cashback in a later day after your order has been processed, and you can view this cashback in your JuSaves account's balance.
Lastly, you can earn JuSaves referral credit by inviting your friends to sign up! By doing this, you will help them get extra savings as well as earn yourself JuSaves credits. JuSaves provides many ways for you to cash out this credit, including gift card, cashback bonus, and 3x multiplier cash out amount.
